root.name: Hot Rod: Garage to Glory
root.description: GameplayÂ The gameplay in Hot Rod: Garage to Glory is fairly simple. It involves putting together a custom hot rod and then participating in drag races against A.I. opponents. The game--like any drag racing game--is all about your cars performance as well as your reaction time to get off the line. You win money with each victory which you can then spend on high-performance parts for your hot rod.
